card.title: Space Shuttle Program STS-6
card.shortDescription: First spacewalk during a space shuttle mission
card.longDescription: First spaceflight that landed the first humans on the Moon. Neil Armstrong is the first to step onto the lunar surface, he spent about two and a half hours outside the spacecraft. Buzz Aldrin is the second one. They collected 21.5 kg of lunar material. Michael Collins, was piloting the command spacecraft alone in lunar orbit during this time.Fifth mission of the Apollo Program
